alert.note: Alert for Central Siskiyou County; Modoc County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Air Stagnation Advisory issued January 22 at 3:28AM PST until January 29 at 4:00AM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...AIR STAGNATION ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 4 AM PST SATURDAY... * WHAT...A period of stagnant air with light winds and poor mixing is expected. * WHERE...Portions of northern California and south central and southwest Oregon, mostly in valley locations. * WHEN...From 10 PM January 22 to 4 AM PST Saturday January 29. * IMPACTS...Air stagnation could result in the development and persistence of deteriorating air quality. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: State air quality agencies highly recommend that no outdoor burning occur and that residential wood burning devices be limited as much as possible. According to state air quality agencies, prolonged periods of stagnant air can hold pollutants close to the ground where people live and breathe. Check with your local burn agency for any current restrictions in your area.

area.areaDesc: Central Siskiyou County; Modoc County; Northeast Siskiyou and Northwest Modoc Counties; South Central Siskiyou County; Western Siskiyou County
